The mission of Lake McMurtry Friends is to enrich the quality of life by providing opportunities to engage in sustainable outdoor recreation, environmental education, and nature conservation. Contact Information 405-747-8085 Info@lakemcmurtry.org After Hours Contact East Camp Host 405-747-4688 ranger@lakemcmurtry.org West Camp Host 405-858-0203 camphost@lakemcmurtry.org Stillwater Police Department 405-372-4171 Amenities
//About Us Strings Park Info Rules Wildlife Our Mission Our Purpose The mission of Lake McMurtry Friends is to enrich quality of life by providing opportunities to engage in sustainable outdoor recreation, environmental education and nature conservation. Lake McMurtry Friends, Inc. was formed to manage and protect the lake, but more than that we are organized to promote outdoor recreation and leisure, scientific and educational study, and community involvement. We are a small group of individuals who want to see Lake McMurtry succeed and continue to be available to the general public for generations to come. After all this park belongs to the people of our community and we wish to represent that each and every day!
Lake McMurtry Friends, Inc. is a private 501 (c)3 non-profit organization.
